name: AnimeHelper
0:
”Alexa tell anime helper I want to know more about Black Clover”
”Alexa tell anime helper show my calendar”
”Alexa tell anime helper show anime similar to Black Clover”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anime helper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Anime Helper allows you to search for anime description, get suggestions, know when the next episode will air and track your favorite anime with a daily calendar notification.

Just try to ask:

- "I want to know more about Black Clover"
- "Show me similar anime to Black Clover"
- "What's the next airing episode of Black Clover?"
- "Show my calendar"
